post.title: new official geforce 178.13 whql drivers released by nvidia
post.content: new official whql certified drivers from nvidia, would be nice to get feedback from nvidia users here. http://www.nvidia.com/object/winxp_178.13_whql.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winxp64_178.13_whql.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winvist...8.13_whql.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winvist...8.13_whql.html
